original_text: And they fetched up, and brought forth out of Egypt a chariot for six hundred shekels of silver, and an horse for an hundred and fifty: and so brought they out horses for all the kings of the Hittites, and for the kings of Syria, by their means.
korean_text: 애굽에서 사들인 병거는 한 대에 은 육백 세겔이요 말은 백오십 세겔이라 이와 같이 헷 사람들의 모든 왕들과 아람 왕들을 위하여 그들의 손으로 되팔기도 하였더라

sentences.original_text: and brought forth out of Egypt a chariot
for six hundred shekels of silver
and an horse for an hundred and fifty
and so brought they out horses
for all the kings of the Hittites
and for the kings of Syria
